description: The best rum cocktails for fall are best served cold. The best way to get a drink that's ready for autumn is to whip up some Dead Frenchmen cocktail with your favorite white&nbsp;rum! This recipe for the cocktail includes violet liqueur, heavy cream, and white cocoa.
name: Dead Frenchmen

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the white rum, violet liqueur, heavy cream, and white cacao. Fill to the top with more crushed ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the white rum, violet liqueur, heavy cream, and white cacao. Fill to the top with more crushed ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously for up to 30 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake vigorously for up to 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass
